mapper.insert: insert into JMF_RECV_MSG (MSG_SEQ_NO, VERSION, TASK_NAME, SYS_NAME, MESSAGE_ID, FILE_NAME, MESSAGE_TYPE, SENDER_ID, RECEIVER_ID, SEND_TIME, STATUS, EXCEPTION_TYPE, ID_NAME1, ID1, ID_NAME2, ID2, ID_NAME3, ID3, INFO_NAME1, INFO1, INFO_NAME2, INFO2, INFO_NAME3, INFO3, INFO_STATUS, FILE_PATH, ADD_TIME, NOTES, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME ) values (#{msgSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{messageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{messageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exceptionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idName1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idName2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idName3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infoName1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infoName2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infoName3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infoStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update JMF_RECV_MSG set VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_NAME = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_NAME = #{sysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MESSAGE_TYPE = #{messageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SENDER_ID = #{senderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECEIVER_ID = #{receiverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_TIME = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXCEPTION_TYPE = #{exceptionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_NAME1 = #{idName1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID1 = #{id1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_NAME2 = #{idName2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID2 = #{id2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_NAME3 = #{idName3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID3 = #{id3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFO_NAME1 = #{infoName1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFO1 = #{info1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFO_NAME2 = #{infoName2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFO2 = #{info2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFO_NAME3 = #{infoName3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFO3 = #{info3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFO_STATUS = #{infoStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_PATH = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NOTES = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where MSG_SEQ_NO = #{msgSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select MSG_SEQ_NO, VERSION, TASK_NAME, SYS_NAME, MESSAGE_ID, FILE_NAME, MESSAGE_TYPE, SENDER_ID, RECEIVER_ID, SEND_TIME, STATUS, EXCEPTION_TYPE, ID_NAME1, ID1, ID_NAME2, ID2, ID_NAME3, ID3, INFO_NAME1, INFO1, INFO_NAME2, INFO2, INFO_NAME3, INFO3, INFO_STATUS, FILE_PATH, ADD_TIME, NOTES, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME from JMF_RECV_MSG where MSG_SEQ_NO = #{msgSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select MSG_SEQ_NO, VERSION, TASK_NAME, SYS_NAME, MESSAGE_ID, FILE_NAME, MESSAGE_TYPE, SENDER_ID, RECEIVER_ID, SEND_TIME, STATUS, EXCEPTION_TYPE, ID_NAME1, ID1, ID_NAME2, ID2, ID_NAME3, ID3, INFO_NAME1, INFO1, INFO_NAME2, INFO2, INFO_NAME3, INFO3, INFO_STATUS, FILE_PATH, ADD_TIME, NOTES, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME from JMF_RECV_MSG
